class.name: DojoSessionAccount
class.description: This class is used to interact with a session account. It allows you to execute transactions, query account information, and manage account state.

method.name: create
method.description: Initializes the session account with the given parameters.

method.name: create_from_subscribe
method.description: Initializes the session account from a subscription.

method.name: execute
method.description: Executes a transaction with the given calls.

method.name: execute_from_outside
method.description: Executes a transaction from outside the session.

method.name: execute_from_outside_raw
method.description: Executes a single call from outside the session. This is a convenience method that wraps [method execute_from_outside].

method.name: execute_raw
method.description: Executes a single call. This is a convenience method that wraps [method execute].

method.name: generate_session_request_url
method.description: Generates a URL to request a session.

method.name: get_address
method.description: Returns the address of the session account.

method.name: get_chain_id
method.description: Returns the chain ID of the network.

method.name: get_expires_at
method.description: Returns the expiration timestamp of the session.

method.name: get_info
method.description: Returns a dictionary with information about the session account.

method.name: get_register_session_policy
method.description: Returns the policy for registering a session.

method.name: get_session_policy
method.description: Returns the policy of the session.

method.name: is_expired
method.description: Returns true if the session is expired.

method.name: is_revoked
method.description: Returns true if the session is revoked.

method.name: is_valid
method.description: Returns true if the session is valid.

members.member: The full policies of the session.
